DOC.brief_title: Safety Study Human Anti-Cytomegalovirus Monoclonal Antibody
DOC.detailed_description: Human cytomegalovirus ( HCMV ) disease remain unmet medical need : In US , estimate prevalence congenital HCMV infection ~1 % one leading cause permanent hearing loss neurological deficit child . In immunocompromised individual transplant recipient cause serious life-threatening disease may significantly increase risk graft rejection . As exist therapy HCMV serious side effect , remain medical need safe effective treatment HCMV disease .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult volunteer Normal lab test Prior treatment monoclonal antibody
